title: Adaptive Edge Learning for Resilient Environmental Monitoring
authors: Y. Chen, M. Ruiz, L. Gupta, and A. Lee
venue: Proceedings of the ACM on Interactive, Mobile, Wearable and Ubiquitous Technologies
abstract: Introduces a cryptography-aware edge learning framework that maintains data confidentiality while enabling rapid environmental sensing.

title: Explainable Multi-Agent Systems for Mission-Critical Decision Making
authors: S. Patel, K. Johnson, and R. Singh
venue: IEEE Transactions on Systems, Man, and Cybernetics
abstract: Presents interpretable agent coordination methods supported by verifiable information-sharing protocols.

title: Human-in-the-Loop Evaluation of Trust in Interactive AI Assistants
authors: L. Adams, C. Martinez, and T. Wilson
venue: CHI Conference on Human Factors in Computing Systems
abstract: Evaluates how cryptographic assurances surface in user trust for conversational agents through iterative lab studies.

title: Secure Federated Learning with On-Device Differential Privacy
authors: D. Kim, M. Laurent, and H. Zhao
note: Special Issue on Privacy Preserving Machine Learning
abstract: Demonstrates a privacy-preserving federated learning protocol using lightweight cryptographic primitives for mobile devices.
